dmca.title: Martinibuster.com Complains of Site Rip-Off By Competitor
dmca.body:
To: Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

From [private]
[private]
San Francisco, CA 94110 
XXX-XXX-XXXX


Notice of copyright infringement
1: The copyrighted work at issue appears at martinibuster.com.

2: The material that is infringing on my copyrighted work is located at 
http://www.constructionsales.co.uk 

as well as http://www.constructionsales.co.uk/contact/ where it clearly says copyright 2004 martinibuster.com

Every page of his website violates my copyright because it's an exact copy.

3. My contact information: 
[private]
XXX-XXX-XXXX
[private]@martinibuster.com

4. Contact information for the offending party:
Email: [private]@constructionsales.co.uk

Construction Business Development Ltd 
[private]
[private]
Basingstoke
Hants
RG24 9RA
Phone number in the UK is XXXXX XXXXXX

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
